model
Class PlayerIdentity

java.lang.Object
  model.PlayerIdentity

public class PlayerIdentity
extends java.lang.Object

Represent the immutable player identity for a Player object in a Yahtzee game. I'm not going to lie, the only reason for this class is to fulfill the requirement to have one immutable class. I had originally planned for the Score to be immutable, but I found that to be a rather cumbersome idea. So, here it is, my one immutable and consequently completely frivolous class.

Version:
2.0.1 2/8/2012
Author:
Aaron Lamb
